item.description:
The Providence Preservation Society is hosting their annual Holiday Festival and Stroll. This years stroll will primarily feature the opportunity to tour some of the downtown lofts. However, if you're looking to hear some carolers, sip some cider and take in some of the cheer of the season, this is the event for you.

If you wish to go on the home tours, more information is available at the PPS website.

The Christmas Tree Lighting is at 5:45 at City Hall. The Stroll officially runs from 11am to 4PM.
item.name: Providence Holiday Festival, Downtown Stroll and Tree Lighting
